  CREATE TABLE "EMPREGADO" 
   (	"NOME" CHAR(1), 
	"RG" NUMBER GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999999999999999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20 NOORDER  NOCYCLE  NOKEEP  NOSCALE  NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"CIC" NUMBER, 
	"DEPTO" NUMBER, 
	"RG_SUPERVISOR" NUMBER, 
	"SALARIO" FLOAT(126), 
	 CONSTRAINT "EMPREGADO_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("RG")
  USING INDEX  ENABLE
   ) ;
